name: RBK-250 PTAB-2.5M
description:
The Russian RBK 250 PTAB-2.5M is a cluster bomb dispenser for the delivery of the PTAB-2.5M submunition.

The PTAB 2.5M bomblet is an improved version of the PTAB 2.5 high-explosive anti-tank (HEAT) submunition.

data.Warhead: PTAB 2.5 High Explosive Anti Tank bomblets
